author: struberg
msg: OWB-542 fixed by not adding the Dependent bean in the ProducerMethodBean
This partly reverts r1079461 and omits the addDependent call in the
(hopefully) right place. The idea is to always add @Dependent beans
and not add all other scopes at all.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-5113: Intermittent failure in BlobSetMethodsTest on Java 7: Unable to set stream: 'Reached EOF prematurely; expected 1,024, got 0.'
Made Util.setStreamFailure() preserve the stack trace of the underlying exception to help debugging the problem.
